########################################################################
# Include python install macros
########################################################################
include(GrPython)
if(NOT PYTHONINTERP_FOUND)
    return()
endif()

add_subdirectory(bindings)

########################################################################
# Install python sources
########################################################################
GR_PYTHON_INSTALL(
    FILES
    __init__.py
    DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/gnuradio/advoqpsk
)

########################################################################
# Handle the unit tests
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

set(GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-advoqpsk)

# Create a package directory that tests can import. It includes everything
# from `python/`.
add_custom_target(
  copy_module_for_tests ALL
  COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_directory ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
          ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test_modules/gnuradio/advoqpsk/
)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_precfofix ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_precfofix.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_trigger ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_trigger.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_sync ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_sync.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_decode ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_decode.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_divider ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_divider.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_powerstep ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_powerstep.py)
